summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the issuance and sale of limited tax levy general obligation bonds in a principal amount of not more than $10,400,000 for the purpose of acquiring property and property rights and for the planning and construction of the Westlake Project within the Central Business District, combining parks, off-street parking facilities, transportation terminals, public plazas and malls, cultural facilities, visitor information centers, public restroom facilities, and complementary private commercial development.
committee: Parks and Public Grounds and Finance
